nodes.text: The RK-7 Starforged blaster was a model of blaster pistol available during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. It was a similar model to the RK-5 Starforged blaster, but featured a large magazine on its stock.
The RK-7 Starforged blaster was first added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as part of the Master's Shadow Pack.
